sys_ui_script.name: x_500652_numer0n.checkCall_ui

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_1bf14cf407a1101020b5f4be7c1ed0ec
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_500652_numer0n.checkCall_ui</name><script><![CDATA[function checkCall() {

    var e = 0; //EAT
    var b = 0; //BITE

    //mynum1と見比べる
    if (g_form.getValue('mynum1') === g_form.getValue('call1')) {
        e++;
    } else if (g_form.getValue('mynum1') === g_form.getValue('call2') || g_form.getValue('mynum1') === g_form.getValue('call3')) {
        b++;
    }

    //mynum2と見比べる
    if (g_form.getValue('mynum2') === g_form.getValue('call2')) {
        e++;
    } else if (g_form.getValue('mynum2') === g_form.getValue('call1') || g_form.getValue('mynum2') === g_form.getValue('call3')) {
        b++;
    }

    //mynum3と見比べる
    if (g_form.getValue('mynum3') === g_form.getValue('call3')) {
        e++;
    } else if (g_form.getValue('mynum3') === g_form.getValue('call1') || g_form.getValue('mynum3') === g_form.getValue('call2')) {
        b++;
    }

    if (e === 3) {
        alert(e + "EAT!  congratulations!!!!");
        jslog(e + "EAT!  congratulations!!!!");
    } else {
        var str = "「" + g_form.getValue('call1') + "," + g_form.getValue('call2') + "," + g_form.getValue('call3') + "」 " +
            e + "EAT  " + b + "BITE";
        alert(str);
        jslog(str);
    }


}]]></script><script_name>checkCall_ui</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-19 04:49:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>1bf14cf407a1101020b5f4be7c1ed0ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_500652_numer0n.checkCall_ui</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Numer0n" source="x_500652_numer0n">750618aa2f15d01055ae309cf699b6c4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Numer0n">750618aa2f15d01055ae309cf699b6c4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_1bf14cf407a1101020b5f4be7c1ed0ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 04:49:59</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
